name: BOYSEN®® Zebra Waterbased Marking Paint™

info.title: DESCRIPTION
info.body: BOYSEN®® Zebra Waterbased Marking Paint™ is an acrylic paint formulated with tough fillers making it ideal for concrete surfaces where safety markings are essential.

info.title: FEATURES
info.body:
Good durability
Fast-drying paint
Low in odor, no solvent smell
No thinner required
Easy clean up with water

info.title: PRINCIPAL USES
info.body: It can be used on parking wall ramps, concrete barriers, and signages on concrete surfaces. Product is not intended to be applied on floors.

info.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
info.subtitle: Concrete Surfaces
info.body: Allow new concrete to dry for 14-28 days under normal weather conditions before painting. Remove oil and grease by using detergents or degreasers. Painting over a roughened concrete is recommended to improve adhesion of succeeding coats.

info.title: PAINTING SCHEDULE
info.body: Primer: BOYSEN®® EcoPrimer™ B‑105 or BOYSEN®® Permacoat™ B‑701 2nd & 3rd coat: BOYSEN®® Zebra Waterbased Marking Paint™
